comments:
I have a rptdesign that references a rptlibrary. In the designer and in the preview everything looks fine. But when I run the report in the web app (generated by the new wizard), it throws a DesignFileException. It complains that the style "NewStyle" is used twice.

The report just references the library, it does not use any elements from it. If I remove the reference, the report can also be viewed in the web app. The report contains two text fields, that refer to the same style name "NewStyle". Thats what causes the error. If one of the styles is removed, the error disappears. Also the error disappears, when you remove the reference to the library (which is not used at all). Finally it maybe has something to do with the Text element, in another context a Data element worked fine with multiple references to the same style.

bad.rptlibrary

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<library xmlns="http://www.eclipse.org/birt/2005/design" version="3.2.9" id="1">
    <property name="createdBy">Eclipse BIRT Designer Version 2.1.1.v20060922-1058 Build <20060926-0959></property>
    <property name="comments">Copyright (c) 2006 <<Your Company Name here>></property>
    <property name="theme">defaultTheme</property>
    <themes>
        <theme name="defaultTheme" id="2"/>
    </themes>
    <page-setup>
        <simple-master-page name="MyMasterPage" id="3"/>
    </page-setup>
</library>


bad.rptdesign

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<report xmlns="http://www.eclipse.org/birt/2005/design" version="3.2.9" id="1">
    <property name="createdBy">Eclipse BIRT Designer Version 2.2.0.v20061117-1020 Build <20061117-1020></property>
    <property name="units">in</property>
    <property name="comments">Copyright (c) 2006 <<Your Company Name here>></property>
    <list-property name="libraries">
        <structure>
            <property name="fileName">bad.rptlibrary</property>
            <property name="namespace">bad</property>
        </structure>
    </list-property>
    <styles>
        <style name="NewStyle" id="69"/>
    </styles>
    <page-setup>
        <simple-master-page name="NewSimpleMasterPage" id="68"/>
    </page-setup>
    <body>
        <text id="59">
            <property name="style">NewStyle</property>
            <text-property name="content"><![CDATA[Text 1]]></text-property>
        </text>
        <text id="67">
            <property name="style">NewStyle</property>
            <text-property name="content"><![CDATA[Text 2]]></text-property>
        </text>
    </body>
</report>


The exception

When writes rptdocument, the shared style name was treated as the element name. Reorganize property search algorithm to avoid this case.

This check in was made in local server since internet service is unreliable.

traces.message: The design file bad.rptdesign has error and can not be run.
